mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(TOTAL),1) AS TOTAL,ROUND(AVG(SERVICE),1) AS SERVICE, ROUND(AVG(CLEANLINESS),1) AS CLEANLINESS, ROUND(AVG(COST),1) AS COST, ROUND(AVG(LOCATION),1) AS LOCATION, COUNT(*) AS TOTALCNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN MYSEX='남성' THEN 1 end) AS MAN,COUNT(CASE WHEN MYSEX='여성' THEN 1 end) AS WOMAN, COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE),TRUNC(MYBIRTH))/12) BETWEEN 0 AND 19 THEN 1 END) AS TEN, COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE),TRUNC(MYBIRTH))/12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 1 END) AS TWENTY, COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE),TRUNC(MYBIRTH))/12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 1 END) AS THIRTY, COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE),TRUNC(MYBIRTH))/12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 1 END) AS FOURTY, COUNT(CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE),TRUNC(MYBIRTH))/12) > 50 THEN 1 END) AS FIFTY FROM (SELECT TOTAL,SERVICE,CLEANLINESS,COST,LOCATION,MYSEX,MYBIRTH FROM MYMEMBER, REVIEW WHERE MYID=WRITER AND CAMPNO=#{campno})
mapper.update: UPDATE CAMP SET THUMBNAIL=(#{src}) WHERE CAMPNO=(select campno from(select * from camp order by campno DESC)where ROWNUM = 1)
UPDATE ROOM SET THUMBNAIL=(#{src}) WHERE ROOMNO=(select roomno from(select * from room order by roomno DESC)where ROWNUM = 1)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION WHERE ROOMNO=#{roomno}) WHERE (#{check_in} BETWEEN CHECK_IN AND CHECK_OUT) OR (#{check_out} BETWEEN CHECK_IN AND CHECK_OUT)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM RESERVATION ORDER BY RESERVNO DESC )WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT * FROM ROOM WHERE ROOMNO NOT IN( SELECT ROOMNO FROM RESERVATION WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno} AND (CHECK_IN BETWEEN #{check_in} AND #{check_out}) OR(CHECK_OUT BETWEEN #{check_in} AND #{check_out})) AND CAMPNO=#{campno}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET STATUS='N' WHERE RESERVNO = #{reservno}
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_PRICE FROM (SELECT * FROM ROOM WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno} ORDER BY CAST(ROOM_PRICE AS NUMBER)) WHERE ROWNUM=1;
mapper.update: UPDATE CAMP SET LOWEST_PRICE=(SELECT ROOM_PRICE FROM (SELECT * FROM ROOM WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno} ORDER BY CAST(ROOM_PRICE AS NUMBER)) WHERE ROWNUM=1) WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno}
UPDATE CAMP SET VIEW_COUNT=VIEW_COUNT+1 WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno}
UPDATE CAMP SET TOTAL_GRADE=(SELECT ROUND(AVG(TOTAL),1) FROM REVIEW WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno}) WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno}
mapper.select: SELECT CAMPNO FROM CAMP WHERE ROWNUM=1 ORDER BY CAMPNO DESC

SELECT * FROM CAMP WHERE ((NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') OR (TAGS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
AND (CAMP_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{item}||'%')
AND (ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%')
AND (CAST(LOWEST_PRICE AS NUMBER) BETWEEN CAST(#{low_price} AS NUMBER) AND CAST(#{high_price} AS NUMBER) )
ORDER BY LOWEST_PRICE DESC ORDER BY LOWEST_PRICE ASC ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC ORDER BY TOTAL_GRADE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CAMP SET REVIEW_COUNT=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno}) WHERE CAMPNO=#{campno}
